name: Salmon and Shrimp in Cream Sauce
description: Salmon and Shrimp in Cream Sauce creamy and deliccious protein dish.
steps: 1) In a large skillet with high sides (or shallow Dutch oven) add a couple tablespoons of olive oil and garlic and start to sizzle over medium heat, meanwhile in a separate large skillet, start searing your seasoned salmon and shrimp over medium high heat (do this in batches) and remove to a plate.
2) In the Dutch oven, add the tomatoes, sun dried tomatoes, little parsley and basil and saut√© for about 4 minutes.

3) Add the wine to the tomato mixture, allow to reduce by half, after reduced, add the cream along with some salt and pepper to taste, turn the heat down to low, let it simmer for about 5 minutes, then stir in your parm and add the seared salmon and shrimp back in along with your remaining herbs, cook for about 5 minutes over medium heat then serve over rice.
